name: Doom's Peak
description:
Doom's Peak did not get it's reputation for nothing. Anyone who has attempted to descend it, has not came back in one piece. Well, I am not 'anyone', I will not only return alive, but feeling more alive than ever. My descent will be written about in history books.

 Doom's Peak - Delay the inevitable

Are you the first to descend the Doom's Peak, or will you join rest in the grave?

In Doom's Peak, you control a reckless snowboarder, descending a steep mountain full of obstacles and ramps to do tricks on! Try to get the highest score, as you go faster and faster, until death comes knocking at your door.

Features

  • Fun and addicting snowboarding gameplay
  • Full 3D graphics and story
  • Mindblowing soundscape
  • Point system based on performance and tricks

This is a Ludum Dare 50 entry, better formatting & more info here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/dooms-peak
